data.text: most nearly appertains to us both. I think our

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: father will hence to-night.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: That's most certain, and with you; next month with us.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: You see how full of changes his age is; the

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: observation we have made of it hath not been

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: little: he always loved our sister most; and

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: with what poor judgment he hath now cast her off

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: appears too grossly.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: 'Tis the infirmity of his age: yet he hath ever

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: but slenderly known himself.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: The best and soundest of his time hath been but

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: rash; then must we look to receive from his age,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: not alone the imperfections of long-engraffed

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: condition, but therewithal the unruly waywardness

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: that infirm and choleric years bring with them.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Such unconstant starts are we like to have from

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: him as this of Kent's banishment.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: There is further compliment of leavetaking

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: between France and him. Pray you, let's hit

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: together: if our father carry authority with

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: such dispositions as he bears, this last

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: surrender of his will but offend us.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: We shall further think on't.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: We must do something, and i' the heat.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Thou, nature, art my goddess; to thy law

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: My services are bound. Wherefore should I

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Stand in the plague of custom, and permit

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: The curiosity of nations to deprive me,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: For that I am some twelve or fourteen moon-shines

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Lag of a brother? Why bastard? wherefore base?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: When my dimensions are as well compact,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: My mind as generous, and my shape as true,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: As honest madam's issue? Why brand they us

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: With base? with baseness? bastardy? base, base?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Who, in the lusty stealth of nature, take

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: More composition and fierce quality

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Than doth, within a dull, stale, tired bed,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Go to the creating a whole tribe of fops,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Got 'tween asleep and wake? Well, then,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Legitimate Edgar, I must have your land:

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Our father's love is to the bastard Edmund

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: As to the legitimate: fine word,--legitimate!

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Well, my legitimate, if this letter speed,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: And my invention thrive, Edmund the base

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Shall top the legitimate. I grow; I prosper:

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Now, gods, stand up for bastards!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Kent banish'd thus! and France in choler parted!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: And the king gone to-night! subscribed his power!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Confined to exhibition! All this done

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Upon the gad! Edmund, how now! what news?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: So please your lordship, none.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Why so earnestly seek you to put up that letter?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I know no news, my lord.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: What paper were you reading?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Nothing, my lord.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: No? What needed, then, that terrible dispatch of

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: it into your pocket? the quality of nothing hath

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: not such need to hide itself. Let's see: come,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: if it be nothing, I shall not need spectacles.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I beseech you, sir, pardon me: it is a letter

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: from my brother, that I have not all o'er-read;

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: and for so much as I have perused, I find it not

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: fit for your o'er-looking.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Give me the letter, sir.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I shall offend, either to detain or give it. The

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: contents, as in part I understand them, are to blame.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Let's see, let's see.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I hope, for my brother's justification, he wrote

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: this but as an essay or taste of my virtue.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: [Reads]  'This policy and reverence of age makes

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: the world bitter to the best of our times; keeps

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: our fortunes from us till our oldness cannot relish

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: them. I begin to find an idle and fond bondage

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: in the oppression of aged tyranny; who sways, not

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: as it hath power, but as it is suffered. Come to

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: me, that of this I may speak more. If our father

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: would sleep till I waked him, you should half his

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: revenue for ever, and live the beloved of your

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: brother,	EDGAR.'

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Hum--conspiracy!--'Sleep till I waked him,--you

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: should enjoy half his revenue,'--My son Edgar!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Had he a hand to write this? a heart and brain

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: to breed it in?--When came this to you? who

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: brought it?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: It was not brought me, my lord; there's the

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: cunning of it; I found it thrown in at the

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: casement of my closet.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: You know the character to be your brother's?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: If the matter were good, my lord, I durst swear

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: it were his; but, in respect of that, I would

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: fain think it were not.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: It is his.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: It is his hand, my lord; but I hope his heart is

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: not in the contents.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Hath he never heretofore sounded you in this business?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Never, my lord: but I have heard him oft

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: maintain it to be fit, that, sons at perfect age,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: and fathers declining, the father should be as

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: ward to the son, and the son manage his revenue.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: O villain, villain! His very opinion in the

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: letter! Abhorred villain! Unnatural, detested,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: brutish villain! worse than brutish! Go, sirrah,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: seek him; I'll apprehend him: abominable villain!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Where is he?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I do not well know, my lord. If it shall please

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: you to suspend your indignation against my

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: brother till you can derive from him better

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: testimony of his intent, you shall run a certain

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: course; where, if you violently proceed against

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: him, mistaking his purpose, it would make a great

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: gap in your own honour, and shake in pieces the

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: heart of his obedience. I dare pawn down my life

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: for him, that he hath wrote this to feel my

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: affection to your honour, and to no further

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: pretence of danger.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Think you so?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: If your honour judge it meet, I will place you

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: where you shall hear us confer of this, and by an

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: auricular assurance have your satisfaction; and

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: that without any further delay than this very evening.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: He cannot be such a monster--

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Nor is not, sure.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: To his father, that so tenderly and entirely

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: loves him. Heaven and earth! Edmund, seek him

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: out: wind me into him, I pray you: frame the

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: business after your own wisdom. I would unstate

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: myself, to be in a due resolution.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I will seek him, sir, presently: convey the

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: business as I shall find means and acquaint you withal.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: These late eclipses in the sun and moon portend

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: no good to us: though the wisdom of nature can

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: reason it thus and thus, yet nature finds itself

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: scourged by the sequent effects: love cools,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: friendship falls off, brothers divide: in

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: cities, mutinies; in countries, discord; in

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: palaces, treason; and the bond cracked 'twixt son

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: and father. This villain of mine comes under the

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: prediction; there's son against father: the king

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: falls from bias of nature; there's father against

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: child. We have seen the best of our time:

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: machinations, hollowness, treachery, and all

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: ruinous disorders, follow us disquietly to our

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: graves. Find out this villain, Edmund; it shall

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: lose thee nothing; do it carefully. And the

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: noble and true-hearted Kent banished! his

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: offence, honesty! 'Tis strange.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: This is the excellent foppery of the world, that,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: when we are sick in fortune,--often the surfeit

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: of our own behavior,--we make guilty of our

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: disasters the sun, the moon, and the stars: as

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: if we were villains by necessity; fools by

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: heavenly compulsion; knaves, thieves, and

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: treachers, by spherical predominance; drunkards,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: liars, and adulterers, by an enforced obedience of

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: planetary influence; and all that we are evil in,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: by a divine thrusting on: an admirable evasion

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: of whoremaster man, to lay his goatish

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: disposition to the charge of a star! My

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: father compounded with my mother under the

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: dragon's tail; and my nativity was under Ursa

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: major; so that it follows, I am rough and

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: lecherous. Tut, I should have been that I am,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: had the maidenliest star in the firmament

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: twinkled on my bastardizing. Edgar--

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: And pat he comes like the catastrophe of the old

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: comedy: my cue is villanous melancholy, with a

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: sigh like Tom o' Bedlam. O, these eclipses do

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: portend these divisions! fa, sol, la, mi.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: How now, brother Edmund! what serious

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: contemplation are you in?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I am thinking, brother, of a prediction I read

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: this other day, what should follow these eclipses.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Do you busy yourself about that?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I promise you, the effects he writes of succeed

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: unhappily; as of unnaturalness between the child

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: and the parent; death, dearth, dissolutions of

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: ancient amities; divisions in state, menaces and

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: maledictions against king and nobles; needless

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: diffidences, banishment of friends, dissipation

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: of cohorts, nuptial breaches, and I know not what.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: How long have you been a sectary astronomical?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Come, come; when saw you my father last?

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Why, the night gone by.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Spake you with him?

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Ay, two hours together.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Parted you in good terms? Found you no

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: displeasure in him by word or countenance?

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: None at all.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Bethink yourself wherein you may have offended

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: him: and at my entreaty forbear his presence

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: till some little time hath qualified the heat of

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: his displeasure; which at this instant so rageth

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: in him, that with the mischief of your person it

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: would scarcely allay.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Some villain hath done me wrong.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: That's my fear. I pray you, have a continent

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: forbearance till the spied of his rage goes

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: slower; and, as I say, retire with me to my

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: lodging, from whence I will fitly bring you to

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: hear my lord speak: pray ye, go; there's my key:

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: if you do stir abroad, go armed.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Armed, brother!

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Brother, I advise you to the best; go armed: I

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: am no honest man if there be any good meaning

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: towards you: I have told you what I have seen

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: and heard; but faintly, nothing like the image

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: and horror of it: pray you, away.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Shall I hear from you anon?

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: I do serve you in this business.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: A credulous father! and a brother noble,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Whose nature is so far from doing harms,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: That he suspects none: on whose foolish honesty

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: My practises ride easy! I see the business.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Let me, if not by birth, have lands by wit:

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: All with me's meet that I can fashion fit.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Did my father strike my gentleman for chiding of his fool?

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: Yes, madam.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: By day and night he wrongs me; every hour

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: He flashes into one gross crime or other,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: That sets us all at odds: I'll not endure it:

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: His knights grow riotous, and himself upbraids us

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: On every trifle. When he returns from hunting,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: I will not speak with him; say I am sick:

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: If you come slack of former services,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: You shall do well; the fault of it I'll answer.

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: He's coming, madam; I hear him.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Put on what weary negligence you please,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: You and your fellows; I'll have it come to question:

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: If he dislike it, let him to our sister,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Whose mind and mine, I know, in that are one,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Not to be over-ruled. Idle old man,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: That still would manage those authorities

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: That he hath given away! Now, by my life,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Old fools are babes again; and must be used

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: With cheques as flatteries,--when they are seen abused.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Remember what I tell you.

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: Well, madam.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: And let his knights have colder looks among you;

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: What grows of it, no matter; advise your fellows so:

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: I would breed from hence occasions, and I shall,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: That I may speak: I'll write straight to my sister,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: To hold my very course. Prepare for dinner.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: If but as well I other accents borrow,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: That can my speech defuse, my good intent

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: May carry through itself to that full issue

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: For which I razed my likeness. Now, banish'd Kent,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: If thou canst serve where thou dost stand condemn'd,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: So may it come, thy master, whom thou lovest,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Shall find thee full of labours.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Let me not stay a jot for dinner; go get it ready.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: How now! what art thou?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: A man, sir.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What dost thou profess? what wouldst thou with us?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: I do profess to be no less than I seem; to serve

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: him truly that will put me in trust: to love him

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: that is honest; to converse with him that is wise,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: and says little; to fear judgment; to fight when I

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: cannot choose; and to eat no fish.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What art thou?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: A very honest-hearted fellow, and as poor as the king.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: If thou be as poor for a subject as he is for a

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: king, thou art poor enough. What wouldst thou?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Service.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Who wouldst thou serve?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: You.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Dost thou know me, fellow?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: No, sir; but you have that in your countenance

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: which I would fain call master.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What's that?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Authority.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What services canst thou do?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: I can keep honest counsel, ride, run, mar a curious

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: tale in telling it, and deliver a plain message

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: bluntly: that which ordinary men are fit for, I am

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: qualified in; and the best of me is diligence.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: How old art thou?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Not so young, sir, to love a woman for singing, nor

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: so old to dote on her for any thing: I have years

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: on my back forty eight.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Follow me; thou shalt serve me: if I like thee no

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: worse after dinner, I will not part from thee yet.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Dinner, ho, dinner! Where's my knave? my fool?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Go you, and call my fool hither.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: You, you, sirrah, where's my daughter?

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: So please you,--

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What says the fellow there? Call the clotpoll back.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Where's my fool, ho? I think the world's asleep.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: How now! where's that mongrel?

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: He says, my lord, your daughter is not well.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Why came not the slave back to me when I called him.

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: Sir, he answered me in the roundest manner, he would

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: not.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: He would not!

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: My lord, I know not what the matter is; but, to my

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: judgment, your highness is not entertained with that

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: ceremonious affection as you were wont; there's a

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: great abatement of kindness appears as well in the

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: general dependants as in the duke himself also and

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: your daughter.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Ha! sayest thou so?

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: I beseech you, pardon me, my lord, if I be mistaken;

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: for my duty cannot be silent when I think your

data.speaker: Knight
data.text: highness wronged.

data.speaker: KING LEAR

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Must be content to think you old, and so--

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: But she knows what she does.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Is this well spoken?

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: I dare avouch it, sir: what, fifty followers?

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Is it not well? What should you need of more?

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Yea, or so many, sith that both charge and danger

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Speak 'gainst so great a number? How, in one house,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Should many people, under two commands,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Hold amity? 'Tis hard; almost impossible.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Why might not you, my lord, receive attendance

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: From those that she calls servants or from mine?

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Why not, my lord? If then they chanced to slack you,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: We could control them. If you will come to me,--

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: For now I spy a danger,--I entreat you

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: To bring but five and twenty: to no more

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Will I give place or notice.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I gave you all--

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: And in good time you gave it.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Made you my guardians, my depositaries;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: But kept a reservation to be follow'd

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: With such a number. What, must I come to you

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: With five and twenty, Regan? said you so?

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: And speak't again, my lord; no more with me.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Those wicked creatures yet do look well-favour'd,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: When others are more wicked: not being the worst

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Stands in some rank of praise.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I'll go with thee:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Thy fifty yet doth double five and twenty,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And thou art twice her love.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Hear me, my lord;

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: What need you five and twenty, ten, or five,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: To follow in a house where twice so many

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Have a command to tend you?

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: What need one?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: O, reason not the need: our basest beggars

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Are in the poorest thing superfluous:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Allow not nature more than nature needs,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Man's life's as cheap as beast's: thou art a lady;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: If only to go warm were gorgeous,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Why, nature needs not what thou gorgeous wear'st,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Which scarcely keeps thee warm. But, for true need,--

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: You heavens, give me that patience, patience I need!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: You see me here, you gods, a poor old man,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: As full of grief as age; wretched in both!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: If it be you that stir these daughters' hearts

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Against their father, fool me not so much

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: To bear it tamely; touch me with noble anger,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And let not women's weapons, water-drops,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Stain my man's cheeks! No, you unnatural hags,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I will have such revenges on you both,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That all the world shall--I will do such things,--

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What they are, yet I know not: but they shall be

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: The terrors of the earth. You think I'll weep

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: No, I'll not weep:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I have full cause of weeping; but this heart

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Shall break into a hundred thousand flaws,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Or ere I'll weep. O fool, I shall go mad!

data.speaker: CORNWALL
data.text: Let us withdraw; 'twill be a storm.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: This house is little: the old man and his people

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Cannot be well bestow'd.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: 'Tis his own blame; hath put himself from rest,

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: And must needs taste his folly.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: For his particular, I'll receive him gladly,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: But not one follower.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: So am I purposed.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: Where is my lord of Gloucester?

data.speaker: CORNWALL
data.text: Follow'd the old man forth: he is return'd.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: The king is in high rage.

data.speaker: CORNWALL
data.text: Whither is he going?

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: He calls to horse; but will I know not whither.

data.speaker: CORNWALL
data.text: 'Tis best to give him way; he leads himself.

data.speaker: GONERIL
data.text: My lord, entreat him by no means to stay.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Alack, the night comes on, and the bleak winds

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Do sorely ruffle; for many miles a bout

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: There's scarce a bush.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: O, sir, to wilful men,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: The injuries that they themselves procure

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Must be their schoolmasters. Shut up your doors:

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: He is attended with a desperate train;

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: And what they may incense him to, being apt

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: To have his ear abused, wisdom bids fear.

data.speaker: CORNWALL
data.text: Shut up your doors, my lord; 'tis a wild night:

data.speaker: CORNWALL
data.text: My Regan counsels well; come out o' the storm.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Who's there, besides foul weather?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: One minded like the weather, most unquietly.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: I know you. Where's the king?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Contending with the fretful element:

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Bids the winds blow the earth into the sea,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Or swell the curled water 'bove the main,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: That things might change or cease; tears his white hair,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Which the impetuous blasts, with eyeless rage,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Catch in their fury, and make nothing of;

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Strives in his little world of man to out-scorn

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: The to-and-fro-conflicting wind and rain.

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: This night, wherein the cub-drawn bear would couch,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: The lion and the belly-pinched wolf

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Keep their fur dry, unbonneted he runs,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: And bids what will take all.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: But who is with him?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: None but the fool; who labours to out-jest

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: His heart-struck injuries.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Sir, I do know you;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: And dare, upon the warrant of my note,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Commend a dear thing to you. There is division,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Although as yet the face of it be cover'd

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: With mutual cunning, 'twixt Albany and Cornwall;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Who have--as who have not, that their great stars

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Throned and set high?--servants, who seem no less,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Which are to France the spies and speculations

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Intelligent of our state; what hath been seen,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Either in snuffs and packings of the dukes,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Or the hard rein which both of them have borne

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Against the old kind king; or something deeper,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Whereof perchance these are but furnishings;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: But, true it is, from France there comes a power

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Into this scatter'd kingdom; who already,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Wise in our negligence, have secret feet

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: In some of our best ports, and are at point

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: To show their open banner. Now to you:

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: If on my credit you dare build so far

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: To make your speed to Dover, you shall find

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Some that will thank you, making just report

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Of how unnatural and bemadding sorrow

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: The king hath cause to plain.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: I am a gentleman of blood and breeding;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: And, from some knowledge and assurance, offer

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: This office to you.

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: I will talk further with you.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: No, do not.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: For confirmation that I am much more

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Than my out-wall, open this purse, and take

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: What it contains. If you shall see Cordelia,--

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: As fear not but you shall,--show her this ring;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: And she will tell you who your fellow is

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: That yet you do not know. Fie on this storm!

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: I will go seek the king.

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Give me your hand: have you no more to say?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Few words, but, to effect, more than all yet;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: That, when we have found the king,--in which your pain

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: That way, I'll this,--he that first lights on him

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Holla the other.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Blow, winds, and crack your cheeks! rage! blow!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: You cataracts and hurricanoes, spout

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Till you have drench'd our steeples, drown'd the cocks!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: You sulphurous and thought-executing fires,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Vaunt-couriers to oak-cleaving thunderbolts,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Singe my white head! And thou, all-shaking thunder,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Smite flat the thick rotundity o' the world!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Crack nature's moulds, an germens spill at once,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That make ingrateful man!

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: O nuncle, court holy-water in a dry

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: house is better than this rain-water out o' door.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Good nuncle, in, and ask thy daughters' blessing:

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: here's a night pities neither wise man nor fool.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Rumble thy bellyful! Spit, fire! spout, rain!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Nor rain, wind, thunder, fire, are my daughters:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I tax not you, you elements, with unkindness;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I never gave you kingdom, call'd you children,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: You owe me no subscription: then let fall

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Your horrible pleasure: here I stand, your slave,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: A poor, infirm, weak, and despised old man:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: But yet I call you servile ministers,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That have with two pernicious daughters join'd

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Your high engender'd battles 'gainst a head

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: So old and white as this. O! O! 'tis foul!

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: He that has a house to put's head in has a good

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: head-piece.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: The cod-piece that will house

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Before the head has any,

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: The head and he shall louse;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: So beggars marry many.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: The man that makes his toe

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: What he his heart should make

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Shall of a corn cry woe,

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: And turn his sleep to wake.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: For there was never yet fair woman but she made

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: mouths in a glass.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: No, I will be the pattern of all patience;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I will say nothing.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Who's there?

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Marry, here's grace and a cod-piece; that's a wise

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: man and a fool.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Alas, sir, are you here? things that love night

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Love not such nights as these; the wrathful skies

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Gallow the very wanderers of the dark,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: And make them keep their caves: since I was man,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Such sheets of fire, such bursts of horrid thunder,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Such groans of roaring wind and rain, I never

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Remember to have heard: man's nature cannot carry

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: The affliction nor the fear.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Let the great gods,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That keep this dreadful pother o'er our heads,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Find out their enemies now. Tremble, thou wretch,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That hast within thee undivulged crimes,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Unwhipp'd of justice: hide thee, thou bloody hand;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Thou perjured, and thou simular man of virtue

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That art incestuous: caitiff, to pieces shake,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That under covert and convenient seeming

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Hast practised on man's life: close pent-up guilts,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Rive your concealing continents, and cry

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: These dreadful summoners grace. I am a man

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: More sinn'd against than sinning.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Alack, bare-headed!

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Gracious my lord, hard by here is a hovel;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Some friendship will it lend you 'gainst the tempest:

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Repose you there; while I to this hard house--

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: More harder than the stones whereof 'tis raised;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Which even but now, demanding after you,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Denied me to come in--return, and force

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Their scanted courtesy.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: My wits begin to turn.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Come on, my boy: how dost, my boy? art cold?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I am cold myself. Where is this straw, my fellow?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: The art of our necessities is strange,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That can make vile things precious. Come,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: your hovel.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Poor fool and knave, I have one part in my heart

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That's sorry yet for thee.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: [Singing]

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: He that has and a little tiny wit--

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: With hey, ho, the wind and the rain,--

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Must make content with his fortunes fit,

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: For the rain it raineth every day.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: True, my good boy. Come, bring us to this hovel.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: This is a brave night to cool a courtezan.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: I'll speak a prophecy ere I go:

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: When priests are more in word than matter;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: When brewers mar their malt with water;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: When nobles are their tailors' tutors;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: No heretics burn'd, but wenches' suitors;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: When every case in law is right;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: No squire in debt, nor no poor knight;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: When slanders do not live in tongues;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Nor cutpurses come not to throngs;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: When usurers tell their gold i' the field;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: And bawds and whores do churches build;

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Then shall the realm of Albion

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Come to great confusion:

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Then comes the time, who lives to see't,

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: That going shall be used with feet.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: This prophecy Merlin shall make; for I live before his time.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Alack, alack, Edmund, I like not this unnatural

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: dealing. When I desire their leave that I might

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: pity him, they took from me the use of mine own

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: house; charged me, on pain of their perpetual

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: displeasure, neither to speak of him, entreat for

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: him, nor any way sustain him.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Most savage and unnatural!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Go to; say you nothing. There's a division betwixt

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: the dukes; and a worse matter than that: I have

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: received a letter this night; 'tis dangerous to be

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: spoken; I have locked the letter in my closet:

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: these injuries the king now bears will be revenged

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: home; there's part of a power already footed: we

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: must incline to the king. I will seek him, and

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: privily relieve him: go you and maintain talk with

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: the duke, that my charity be not of him perceived:

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: if he ask for me. I am ill, and gone to bed.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Though I die for it, as no less is threatened me,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: the king my old master must be relieved. There is

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: some strange thing toward, Edmund; pray you, be careful.

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: This courtesy, forbid thee, shall the duke

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: Instantly know; and of that letter too:

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: This seems a fair deserving, and must draw me

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: That which my father loses; no less than all:

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: The younger rises when the old doth fall.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Here is the place, my lord; good my lord, enter:

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: The tyranny of the open night's too rough

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: For nature to endure.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Let me alone.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Good my lord, enter here.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Wilt break my heart?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: I had rather break mine own. Good my lord, enter.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Thou think'st 'tis much that this contentious storm

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Invades us to the skin: so 'tis to thee;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: But where the greater malady is fix'd,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: The lesser is scarce felt. Thou'ldst shun a bear;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: But if thy flight lay toward the raging sea,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Thou'ldst meet the bear i' the mouth. When the

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: mind's free,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: The body's delicate: the tempest in my mind

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Doth from my senses take all feeling else

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Save what beats there. Filial ingratitude!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Is it not as this mouth should tear this hand

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: For lifting food to't? But I will punish home:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: No, I will weep no more. In such a night

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: To shut me out! Pour on; I will endure.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: In such a night as this! O Regan, Goneril!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Your old kind father, whose frank heart gave all,--

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: O, that way madness lies; let me shun that;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: No more of that.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Good my lord, enter here.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Prithee, go in thyself: seek thine own ease:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: This tempest will not give me leave to ponder

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: On things would hurt me more. But I'll go in.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: In, boy; go first. You houseless poverty,--

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Nay, get thee in. I'll pray, and then I'll sleep.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Poor naked wretches, whereso'er you are,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That bide the pelting of this pitiless storm,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: How shall your houseless heads and unfed sides,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Your loop'd and window'd raggedness, defend you

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: From seasons such as these? O, I have ta'en

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Too little care of this! Take physic, pomp;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Expose thyself to feel what wretches feel,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That thou mayst shake the superflux to them,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And show the heavens more just.

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Come not in here, nuncle, here's a spirit

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: Help me, help me!

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Give me thy hand. Who's there?

data.speaker: Fool
data.text: A spirit, a spirit: he says his name's poor Tom.

data.text: And now and then an ample tear trill'd down

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Her delicate cheek: it seem'd she was a queen

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Over her passion; who, most rebel-like,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Sought to be king o'er her.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: O, then it moved her.

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Not to a rage: patience and sorrow strove

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Who should express her goodliest. You have seen

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Sunshine and rain at once: her smiles and tears

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Were like a better way: those happy smilets,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: That play'd on her ripe lip, seem'd not to know

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: What guests were in her eyes; which parted thence,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: As pearls from diamonds dropp'd. In brief,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Sorrow would be a rarity most beloved,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: If all could so become it.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Made she no verbal question?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: 'Faith, once or twice she heaved the name of 'father'

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Pantingly forth, as if it press'd her heart:

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Cried 'Sisters! sisters! Shame of ladies! sisters!

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Kent! father! sisters! What, i' the storm? i' the night?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Let pity not be believed!' There she shook

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: The holy water from her heavenly eyes,

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: And clamour moisten'd: then away she started

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: To deal with grief alone.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: It is the stars,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: The stars above us, govern our conditions;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Else one self mate and mate could not beget

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Such different issues. You spoke not with her since?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: No.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Was this before the king return'd?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: No, since.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Well, sir, the poor distressed Lear's i' the town;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Who sometime, in his better tune, remembers

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: What we are come about, and by no means

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Will yield to see his daughter.

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Why, good sir?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: A sovereign shame so elbows him: his own unkindness,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: That stripp'd her from his benediction, turn'd her

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: To foreign casualties, gave her dear rights

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: To his dog-hearted daughters, these things sting

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: His mind so venomously, that burning shame

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Detains him from Cordelia.

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: Alack, poor gentleman!

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Of Albany's and Cornwall's powers you heard not?

data.speaker: Gentleman
data.text: 'Tis so, they are afoot.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Well, sir, I'll bring you to our master Lear,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: And leave you to attend him: some dear cause

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Will in concealment wrap me up awhile;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: When I am known aright, you shall not grieve

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Lending me this acquaintance. I pray you, go

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Along with me.

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Alack, 'tis he: why, he was met even now

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: As mad as the vex'd sea; singing aloud;

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Crown'd with rank fumiter and furrow-weeds,

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: With bur-docks, hemlock, nettles, cuckoo-flowers,

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Darnel, and all the idle weeds that grow

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: In our sustaining corn. A century send forth;

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Search every acre in the high-grown field,

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: And bring him to our eye.

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: What can man's wisdom

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: In the restoring his bereaved sense?

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: He that helps him take all my outward worth.

data.speaker: Doctor
data.text: There is means, madam:

data.speaker: Doctor
data.text: Our foster-nurse of nature is repose,

data.speaker: Doctor
data.text: The which he lacks; that to provoke in him,

data.speaker: Doctor
data.text: Are many simples operative, whose power

data.speaker: Doctor
data.text: Will close the eye of anguish.

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: All blest secrets,

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: All you unpublish'd virtues of the earth,

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Spring with my tears! be aidant and remediate

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: In the good man's distress! Seek, seek for him;

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Lest his ungovern'd rage dissolve the life

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: That wants the means to lead it.

data.speaker: Messenger
data.text: News, madam;

data.speaker: Messenger
data.text: The British powers are marching hitherward.

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: 'Tis known before; our preparation stands

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: In expectation of them. O dear father,

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: It is thy business that I go about;

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Therefore great France

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: My mourning and important tears hath pitied.

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: No blown ambition doth our arms incite,

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: But love, dear love, and our aged father's right:

data.speaker: CORDELIA
data.text: Soon may I hear and see him!

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: But are my brother's powers set forth?

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: Ay, madam.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Himself in person there?

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: Madam, with much ado:

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: Your sister is the better soldier.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Lord Edmund spake not with your lord at home?

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: No, madam.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: What might import my sister's letter to him?

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: I know not, lady.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: 'Faith, he is posted hence on serious matter.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: It was great ignorance, Gloucester's eyes being out,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: To let him live: where he arrives he moves

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: All hearts against us: Edmund, I think, is gone,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: In pity of his misery, to dispatch

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: His nighted life: moreover, to descry

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: The strength o' the enemy.

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: I must needs after him, madam, with my letter.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Our troops set forth to-morrow: stay with us;

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: The ways are dangerous.

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: I may not, madam:

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: My lady charged my duty in this business.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Why should she write to Edmund? Might not you

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Transport her purposes by word? Belike,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Something--I know not what: I'll love thee much,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Let me unseal the letter.

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: Madam, I had rather--

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: I know your lady does not love her husband;

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: I am sure of that: and at her late being here

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: She gave strange oeillades and most speaking looks

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: To noble Edmund. I know you are of her bosom.

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: I, madam?

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: I speak in understanding; you are; I know't:

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Therefore I do advise you, take this note:

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: My lord is dead; Edmund and I have talk'd;

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: And more convenient is he for my hand

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Than for your lady's: you may gather more.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: If you do find him, pray you, give him this;

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: And when your mistress hears thus much from you,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: I pray, desire her call her wisdom to her.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: So, fare you well.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: If you do chance to hear of that blind traitor,

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Preferment falls on him that cuts him off.

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: Would I could meet him, madam! I should show

data.speaker: OSWALD
data.text: What party I do follow.

data.speaker: REGAN
data.text: Fare thee well.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: When shall we come to the top of that same hill?

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: You do climb up it now: look, how we labour.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Methinks the ground is even.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Horrible steep.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Hark, do you hear the sea?

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: No, truly.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Why, then, your other senses grow imperfect

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: By your eyes' anguish.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: So may it be, indeed:

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Methinks thy voice is alter'd; and thou speak'st

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: In better phrase and matter than thou didst.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: You're much deceived: in nothing am I changed

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: But in my garments.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Methinks you're better spoken.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Come on, sir; here's the place: stand still. How fearful

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: And dizzy 'tis, to cast one's eyes so low!

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: The crows and choughs that wing the midway air

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Show scarce so gross as beetles: half way down

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Hangs one that gathers samphire, dreadful trade!

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Methinks he seems no bigger than his head:

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: The fishermen, that walk upon the beach,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Appear like mice; and yond tall anchoring bark,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Diminish'd to her cock; her cock, a buoy

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Almost too small for sight: the murmuring surge,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: That on the unnumber'd idle pebbles chafes,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Cannot be heard so high. I'll look no more;

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Lest my brain turn, and the deficient sight

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Topple down headlong.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Set me where you stand.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Give me your hand: you are now within a foot

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Of the extreme verge: for all beneath the moon

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Would I not leap upright.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Let go my hand.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Here, friend, 's another purse; in it a jewel

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Well worth a poor man's taking: fairies and gods

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Prosper it with thee! Go thou farther off;

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Bid me farewell, and let me hear thee going.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Now fare you well, good sir.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: With all my heart.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Why I do trifle thus with his despair

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Is done to cure it.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: [Kneeling]  O you mighty gods!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: This world I do renounce, and, in your sights,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Shake patiently my great affliction off:

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: If I could bear it longer, and not fall

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: To quarrel with your great opposeless wills,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: My snuff and loathed part of nature should

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Burn itself out. If Edgar live, O, bless him!

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Now, fellow, fare thee well.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Gone, sir: farewell.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: And yet I know not how conceit may rob

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: The treasury of life, when life itself

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Yields to the theft: had he been where he thought,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: By this, had thought been past. Alive or dead?

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Ho, you sir! friend! Hear you, sir! speak!

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Thus might he pass indeed: yet he revives.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: What are you, sir?

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Away, and let me die.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Hadst thou been aught but gossamer, feathers, air,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: So many fathom down precipitating,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Thou'dst shiver'd like an egg: but thou dost breathe;

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Hast heavy substance; bleed'st not; speak'st; art sound.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Ten masts at each make not the altitude

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Which thou hast perpendicularly fell:

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Thy life's a miracle. Speak yet again.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: But have I fall'n, or no?

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: From the dread summit of this chalky bourn.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Look up a-height; the shrill-gorged lark so far

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Cannot be seen or heard: do but look up.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Alack, I have no eyes.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Is wretchedness deprived that benefit,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: To end itself by death? 'Twas yet some comfort,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: When misery could beguile the tyrant's rage,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: And frustrate his proud will.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Give me your arm:

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Up: so. How is 't? Feel you your legs? You stand.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Too well, too well.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: This is above all strangeness.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Upon the crown o' the cliff, what thing was that

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Which parted from you?

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: A poor unfortunate beggar.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: As I stood here below, methought his eyes

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Were two full moons; he had a thousand noses,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Horns whelk'd and waved like the enridged sea:

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: It was some fiend; therefore, thou happy father,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Think that the clearest gods, who make them honours

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Of men's impossibilities, have preserved thee.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: I do remember now: henceforth I'll bear

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Affliction till it do cry out itself

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: 'Enough, enough,' and die. That thing you speak of,

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: I took it for a man; often 'twould say

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: 'The fiend, the fiend:' he led me to that place.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Bear free and patient thoughts. But who comes here?

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: The safer sense will ne'er accommodate

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: His master thus.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: No, they cannot touch me for coining; I am the

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: king himself.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: O thou side-piercing sight!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Nature's above art in that respect. There's your

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: press-money. That fellow handles his bow like a

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: crow-keeper: draw me a clothier's yard. Look,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: look, a mouse! Peace, peace; this piece of toasted

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: cheese will do 't. There's my gauntlet; I'll prove

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: it on a giant. Bring up the brown bills. O, well

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: flown, bird! i' the clout, i' the clout: hewgh!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Give the word.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Sweet marjoram.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Pass.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: I know that voice.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Ha! Goneril, with a white beard! They flattered

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: me like a dog; and told me I had white hairs in my

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: beard ere the black ones were there. To say 'ay'

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: and 'no' to every thing that I said!--'Ay' and 'no'

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: too was no good divinity. When the rain came to

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: wet me once, and the wind to make me chatter; when

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: the thunder would not peace at my bidding; there I

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: found 'em, there I smelt 'em out. Go to, they are

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: not men o' their words: they told me I was every

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: thing; 'tis a lie, I am not ague-proof.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: The trick of that voice I do well remember:

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Is 't not the king?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Ay, every inch a king:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: When I do stare, see how the subject quakes.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I pardon that man's life. What was thy cause? Adultery?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Thou shalt not die: die for adultery! No:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: The wren goes to 't, and the small gilded fly

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Does lecher in my sight.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Let copulation thrive; for Gloucester's bastard son

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Was kinder to his father than my daughters

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Got 'tween the lawful sheets.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: To 't, luxury, pell-mell! for I lack soldiers.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Behold yond simpering dame,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Whose face between her forks presages snow;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That minces virtue, and does shake the head

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: To hear of pleasure's name;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: The fitchew, nor the soiled horse, goes to 't

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: With a more riotous appetite.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Down from the waist they are Centaurs,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Though women all above:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: But to the girdle do the gods inherit,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Beneath is all the fiends';

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: There's hell, there's darkness, there's the

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: sulphurous pit,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Burning, scalding, stench, consumption; fie,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: fie, fie! pah, pah! Give me an ounce of civet,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: good apothecary, to sweeten my imagination:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: there's money for thee.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: O, let me kiss that hand!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Let me wipe it first; it smells of mortality.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: O ruin'd piece of nature! This great world

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Shall so wear out to nought. Dost thou know me?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I remember thine eyes well enough. Dost thou squiny

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: at me? No, do thy worst, blind Cupid! I'll not

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: love. Read thou this challenge; mark but the

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: penning of it.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Were all the letters suns, I could not see one.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: I would not take this from report; it is,

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: And my heart breaks at it.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Read.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: What, with the case of eyes?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: O, ho, are you there with me? No eyes in your

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: head, nor no money in your purse? Your eyes are in

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: a heavy case, your purse in a light; yet you see how

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: this world goes.

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: I see it feelingly.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What, art mad? A man may see how this world goes

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: with no eyes. Look with thine ears: see how yond

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: justice rails upon yond simple thief. Hark, in

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: thine ear: change places; and, handy-dandy, which

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: is the justice, which is the thief? Thou hast seen

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: a farmer's dog bark at a beggar?

data.speaker: GLOUCESTER
data.text: Ay, sir.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And the creature run from the cur? There thou

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: mightst behold the great image of authority: a

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: dog's obeyed in office.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Thou rascal beadle, hold thy bloody hand!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Why dost thou lash that whore? Strip thine own back;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Thou hotly lust'st to use her in that kind

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: For which thou whipp'st her. The usurer hangs the cozener.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Through tatter'd clothes small vices do appear;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Robes and furr'd gowns hide all. Plate sin with gold,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And the strong lance of justice hurtless breaks:

data.speaker: KING LEAR

data.text: To lay the blame upon her own despair,

data.speaker: EDMUND
data.text: That she fordid herself.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: The gods defend her! Bear him hence awhile.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Howl, howl, howl, howl! O, you are men of stones:

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Had I your tongues and eyes, I'ld use them so

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That heaven's vault should crack. She's gone for ever!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I know when one is dead, and when one lives;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: She's dead as earth. Lend me a looking-glass;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: If that her breath will mist or stain the stone,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Why, then she lives.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Is this the promised end

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Or image of that horror?

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Fall, and cease!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: This feather stirs; she lives! if it be so,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: It is a chance which does redeem all sorrows

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: That ever I have felt.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: [Kneeling]  O my good master!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Prithee, away.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: 'Tis noble Kent, your friend.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: A plague upon you, murderers, traitors all!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I might have saved her; now she's gone for ever!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Cordelia, Cordelia! stay a little. Ha!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: What is't thou say'st? Her voice was ever soft,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Gentle, and low, an excellent thing in woman.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I kill'd the slave that was a-hanging thee.

data.speaker: Captain
data.text: 'Tis true, my lords, he did.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Did I not, fellow?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I have seen the day, with my good biting falchion

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I would have made them skip: I am old now,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And these same crosses spoil me. Who are you?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Mine eyes are not o' the best: I'll tell you straight.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: If fortune brag of two she loved and hated,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: One of them we behold.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: This is a dull sight. Are you not Kent?

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: The same,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Your servant Kent: Where is your servant Caius?

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: He's a good fellow, I can tell you that;

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: He'll strike, and quickly too: he's dead and rotten.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: No, my good lord; I am the very man,--

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: I'll see that straight.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: That, from your first of difference and decay,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Have follow'd your sad steps.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: You are welcome hither.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Nor no man else: all's cheerless, dark, and deadly.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Your eldest daughters have fordone them selves,

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: And desperately are dead.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Ay, so I think.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: He knows not what he says: and vain it is

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: That we present us to him.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Very bootless.

data.speaker: Captain
data.text: Edmund is dead, my lord.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: That's but a trifle here.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: You lords and noble friends, know our intent.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: What comfort to this great decay may come

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Shall be applied: for us we will resign,

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: During the life of this old majesty,

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: To him our absolute power:

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: you, to your rights:

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: With boot, and such addition as your honours

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Have more than merited. All friends shall taste

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: The wages of their virtue, and all foes

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: The cup of their deservings. O, see, see!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And my poor fool is hang'd! No, no, no life!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Why should a dog, a horse, a rat, have life,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: And thou no breath at all? Thou'lt come no more,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Never, never, never, never, never!

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Pray you, undo this button: thank you, sir.

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Do you see this? Look on her, look, her lips,

data.speaker: KING LEAR
data.text: Look there, look there!

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: He faints! My lord, my lord!

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Break, heart; I prithee, break!

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: Look up, my lord.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Vex not his ghost: O, let him pass! he hates him much

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: That would upon the rack of this tough world

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: Stretch him out longer.

data.speaker: EDGAR
data.text: He is gone, indeed.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: The wonder is, he hath endured so long:

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: He but usurp'd his life.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Bear them from hence. Our present business

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Is general woe.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Friends of my soul, you twain

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Rule in this realm, and the gored state sustain.

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: I have a journey, sir, shortly to go;

data.speaker: KENT
data.text: My master calls me, I must not say no.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: The weight of this sad time we must obey;

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Speak what we feel, not what we ought to say.

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: The oldest hath borne most: we that are young

data.speaker: ALBANY
data.text: Shall never see so much, nor live so long.
